post_title: Open to Trades: T206 Black Sox Chick Gandil - Old Mill (1 of 7 total graded)
post_content:
FS: T206 Black Sox Chick Gandil - Old Mill

"Exclusive 12" Old Mill - Most scarce of all Gandil backs - 1 of only 7 total graded copies (PSA+SGC) = $1950 in trade value

[img]https://i.imgur.com/cx1W9HWh.jpg[/img]

Prices includes delivery, no fee payment method

I'd like to explore potential trades for my rare T206 Gandil Old Mill (see below).

Given the value of the Gandil card, I'd like to find unique, off-back, and/or HOF T206 in return on trade.

Open to ideas, so feel free to shoot them my way!

Best,
Todd Helfrich
[url]helfrich91@yahoo.com[/url]
